Anybody fish the outposts of Amik Lodge? What experiences have you had?

alleyes - a few years ago, amik outposts joined with lac seul airways to form canadian fly-in fishing, inc. we did a 10 day trip to their springpole lake outpost in 2002 and in 2001 we spent 10 days fishing their shearstone lake when we portaged in from brownstone lake (with excellent adventures) before they built the cabin on shearstone. these guys are one of the best outfitter out there, their rates reflect it and they're not shy about telling you they're worth it. they have a motel right at their base and operate their own aircraft including otters. they offer some of the best lakes around also. i've heard some really great reports about findlay and loree also. i can give tons of info about our excellent trips to springpole and shearstone - and you can do a search on walleyecentral to get lots more. - phish
